item.title: Instagram @WeThePeopleDC - Part 1
item.description: If you have some footprints in Washington D.C. and are active on Instagram, chances are that you may have heard of, or are currently following, the Instagram account @WeThePeopleDC. As its name hints, the account runs on an interesting model: each day, the handle is held by a different person living or working in the nationâ€™s capital. The idea is that the account followers get to see the district through the eyes of Washingtonians of all backgrounds.
